# additionalActivationAction

**Instance Property**

An additional action selected by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var additionalActivationAction: NSUserNotificationAction? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property specifies an additional action selected by the user when the user notification is sent to to the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotificationCenterDelegate] method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotificationCenterDelegate/userNotificationCenter(_:didActivate:)]. The supported values are described in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotification/ActivationType-swift.enum].

## User Notification Activation Method

- **activationType**: Specifies what caused a user notification to occur.
- **additionalActions**: The actions that can be taken on a notification in addition to the default action.
